title: Definitions
context: [ยง21F-2] Definitions. As used in this chapter, unless the context requires otherwise: &ldquo;Committee&rdquo; means the joint legislative budget committee. &ldquo;House&rdquo; means the state house of representatives. &ldquo;Office&rdquo; means the office of the legislative analyst. &ldquo;Senate&rdquo; means the state senate. [L 1990, c 347, pt of ยง2]
